title: Lynda - Managing for Results with Dr.Todd Dewett
description:
Lynda - Managing for Results with Dr.Todd Dewett
1h 21m Appropriate for all Sep 30, 2014 | Uploaded in Nov 7, 2014 by 2boweb

Subjects: Business, Business Skills, Management, 



To be a high-performing manager, you need an advanced understanding of the principles of great leadership. In this course, author and business coach Dr. Todd Dewett shares the secrets businesses large and small use to manage teams, achieve precise results, and intelligently execute business strategies. He focuses on three key areas: motivation, positive change, and decision making.
